modules.comments:
A simple way of managing a tree of state in react while retaining
full control over rerendering.
modules.name: Toestand

declarations.comments:
Return the live value of the box. Reload the current component
when it is updated if the provided effectful callback returns true
declarations.title: useLive

declarations.comments: Create a new box by focusing in on the box with accessor functions.
declarations.title: useFocused

declarations.comments:
A hook which allocates a Box, a flexible mutable wrapper for
state utilising a react ref
declarations.title: useBox

declarations.comments: An effect function which determines whether notifications should be sent.
declarations.title: ShouldReload

a new record where each field is another Box focused over the
corresponding field in the original record.

modules.comments: Utilities for generating focused boxes from boxes that contain records

declarations.comments:
Given a Box (or other ReadWrite) which points at a record, create
a new record where each field is another Box focused over the
corresponding field in the original record.
declarations.title: useFocusedFields

declarations.comments: Builder-returning variant of `useFocusedFields`
declarations.title: useFocusedFields'

modules.name: Toestand.Records

modules.comments:
Manages a collection of listeners which can be selectively
notified of changes to a value.

declarations.comments: Create a new Watches from a should notify predicate.
declarations.title: watches

declarations.comments:
Add a change listener effect. Returns a key that can be used to
unlisten along with modified watches.
declarations.title: listen

declarations.comments: Call back all the listeners with a change
declarations.title: notify

declarations.comments: Remove the provided
declarations.title: unlisten

modules.name: Toestand.Watches
